'N' WHERE A.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) T2 /*상품*/ ON T1.BASE_PD_CD = T2.PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN LATERAL ( /* * 웰스팜 기기 + 모종 결합 계약인 경우, 웰스팜 기기 방문에 수수료 지급 * => 정기배송 패키지 상품(모종)이고 결합 계약인 것을 제외함 * */ SELECT /*+ INDEX(C1 (CNTR_NO, CNTR_SN, SELL_TP_CD)) LEADING(C1 C3) USE_NL(C1 C2 C3) */ C1.CNTR_SN AS SEQ /*순번*/ , C1.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD /*계약상세상태코드*/ , CASE WHEN C1.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD IN ('301', '302', '303') THEN C1.CNTR_PD_ENDDT ELSE NULL END AS CNTR_CAN_DTM /*계약취소일시*/ , NULL AS REQD_DT /*철거일자*/ , NULL AS SL_STP_YN /*매출중지여부*/ , NULL AS CNTR_CAN_RSON_CD /*계약취소사유코드*/ , NULL AS HCR_DV_CD /*홈케어구분코드*/ , TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS C2 /*계약기본*/ ON C1.CNTR_NO = C2.CNTR_NO AND C2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_REL C3 /*계약관계*/ ON C3.BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO = C1.CNTR_NO AND C3.BASE_DTL_CNTR_SN = C1.CNTR_SN AND C3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE C1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND C1.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND C1.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND C1.SELL_TP_CD = '6' /*정기배송*/ UNION ALL /*멤버십*/ SELECT /*+ INDEX(C1 (CNTR_NO, CNTR_SN, SELL_TP_CD)) USE_NL(C1 C2 C3) */ C1.CNTR_SN AS SEQ /*순번*/ , C1.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD /*계약상세상태코드*/ , CASE WHEN C1.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD IN ('301', '302', '303') THEN C1.CNTR_PD_ENDDT ELSE NULL END AS CNTR_CAN_DTM /*멤버십종료일시*/ , NULL AS REQD_DT /*철거일자*/ , NULL AS SL_STP_YN /*매출중지여부*/ , NULL AS CNTR_CAN_RSON_CD /*계약취소사유코드*/ , C3.HCR_DV_CD /*홈케어구분코드*/ , C2.CNTR_CST_NO /*계약고객번호*/ , 'N' AS COMBI_YN /*결합제외여부*/ , C1.BF_ORD_NO /*이전계약번호*/ FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL C1 /*계약상세*/ INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS C2 /*계약기본*/ ON C1.CNTR_NO = C2.CNTR_NO AND C2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_WELLS_DTL C3 /*계약WELLS상세*/ ON C1.CNTR_NO = C3.CNTR_NO AND C1.CNTR_SN = C3.CNTR_SN WHERE C1.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND C1.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND C1.SELL_TP_CD = '3' /*멤버십*/ AND C1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' UNION ALL /* * 렌탈 * 웰스팜 기기이고 결합이 아니면 제외 * */ SELECT /*+ INDEX(C1 (CNTR_NO, CNTR_SN, SELL_TP_CD)) LEADING(C1) USE_NL(C1 C2 C3 C4) */ 0 AS SEQ /*순번*/ , C1.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD /*계약상세상태코드*/ , CASE WHEN C1.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD IN ('301', '302', '303') THEN C1.CNTR_PD_ENDDT ELSE NULL END AS CNTR_CAN_DTM /*계약취소일시*/ , CASE WHEN C1.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD IN ('401','402') THEN C4.REQD_DT ELSE NULL END AS REQD_DT /*철거일자(만료철거일자)*/ , D1.SL_STP_YN /*매출중지여부*/ , C2.CNTR_CAN_RSON_CD /*계약취소사유코드*/ , NULL AS HCR_DV_CD /*홈케어구분코드*/ , C2.CNTR_CST_NO /*계약고객번호*/ , CASE WHEN T2.REF_PD_CLSF_VAL LIKE '05001003%' AND C3.CNTR_REL_DTL_CD = '216' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS COMBI_YN /*결합제외여부*/ , C1.BF_ORD_NO /*이전계약번호*/ FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL C1 /*계약상세*/ INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS C2 /*계약기본*/ ON C1.CNTR_NO = C2.CNTR_NO AND C2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_REL C3 /*계약관계*/ ON C3.BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO = C1.CNTR_NO AND C3.BASE_DTL_CNTR_SN = C1.CNTR_SN AND C3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_WELLS_DTL C4 /*계약WELLS상세*/ ON C4.CNTR_NO = C1.CNTR_NO AND C4.CNTR_SN = C1.CNTR_SN AND C4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ D1 /*WELLS매출월마감내역*/ ON D1.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND D1.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND D1.SL_CL_YM = T1.BASE_YM AND D1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE C1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND C1.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND C1.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND C1.SELL_TP_CD = '2' /*렌탈/리스*/ AND T2.REF_PD_CLSF_VAL LIKE '05001003%' UNION ALL /* * 할부판매(일시불) * 웰스팜 기기이고 결합이 아니면 제외 * */ SELECT /*+ INDEX(C1 (CNTR_NO, CNTR_SN, SELL_TP_CD)) LEADING(C1) USE_NL(C1 C2 C3 C4) */ 0 AS SEQ /*순번*/ , C1.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD /*계약상세상태코드*/ , CASE WHEN C1.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD IN ('301', '302', '303') THEN C1.CNTR_PD_ENDDT ELSE NULL END AS CNTR_CAN_DTM /*계약취소일시*/ , C4.CPS_DT AS REQD_DT /*철거일자(보상일자)*/ , NULL AS SL_STP_YN /*매출중지여부*/ , NULL AS CNTR_CAN_RSON_CD /*계약취소사유코드*/ , C4.HCR_DV_CD /*홈케어구분코드*/ , C2.CNTR_CST_NO /*계약고객번호*/ , CASE WHEN T2.REF_PD_CLSF_VAL LIKE '05001003%' AND C3.CNTR_REL_DTL_CD = '216' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS COMBI_YN /*결합제외여부*/ , C1.BF_ORD_NO /*이전계약번호*/ FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL C1 /*계약상세*/ INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS C2 /*계약기본*/ ON C1.CNTR_NO = C2.CNTR_NO AND C2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_REL C3 /*계약관계*/ ON C3.BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO = C1.CNTR_NO AND C3.BASE_DTL_CNTR_SN = C1.CNTR_SN AND C3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_WELLS_DTL C4 /*계약WELLS상세*/ ON C4.CNTR_NO = C1.CNTR_NO AND C4.CNTR_SN = C1.CNTR_SN AND C4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE C1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND C1.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND C1.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND C1.SELL_TP_CD = '1' /*일시불*/ AND T2.REF_PD_CLSF_VAL LIKE '05001003%' UNION ALL /*회사설치*/ SELECT /*+ INDEX(C1 (CNTR_NO, CNTR_SN, SELL_TP_CD)) LEADING(C1) USE_NL(C1 C2 C3 C4) */ 0 AS SEQ /*순번*/ , C1.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD /*계약상세상태코드*/ , NULL AS CNTR_CAN_DTM /*계약취소일시*/ , C4.REQD_DT AS REQD_DT /*철거일자(반품일자)*/ , NULL AS SL_STP_YN /*매출중지여부*/ , NULL AS CNTR_CAN_RSON_CD /*계약취소사유코드*/ , NULL AS HCR_DV_CD /*홈케어구분코드*/ , C2.CNTR_CST_NO /*계약고객번호*/ , CASE WHEN T2.REF_PD_CLSF_VAL LIKE '05001003%' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS COMBI_YN /*결합제외여부*/ , C1.BF_ORD_NO /*이전계약번호*/ FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL C1 /*계약상세*/ INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS C2 /*계약기본*/ ON C1.CNTR_NO = C2.CNTR_NO AND C2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_WELLS_DTL C4 /*계약WELLS상세*/ ON C4.CNTR_NO = C1.CNTR_NO AND C4.CNTR_SN = C1.CNTR_SN AND C4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE C1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND C1.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND C1.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND C1.SELL_TP_CD = '4' /*회사설치*/ ORDER BY SEQ DESC FETCH FIRST ROW ONLY ) T3 ON 1=1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T4 /* 월파트너내역 */ ON T1.BASE_YM = T4.BASE_YM AND T1.OG_TP_CD = T4.OG_TP_CD AND T1.PRTNR_NO = T4.PRTNR_NO AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN LATERAL ( SELECT SV_FEE_BASE_AMT /*BS기본수수료*/ , SV_FEE_PD_DV_CD /*BS상품그룹*/ FROM TB_FEAM_WELS_SV_FEE_BAS C /*웰스서비스수수료기본*/ WHERE BASE_PD_CD = T1.BASE_PD_CD AND VST_MCN = 0 AND SV_FEE_DV_CD = CASE WHEN T4.OG_TP_CD = 'W03' THEN '2' ELSE '1' END AND HCR_DV_CD = CASE WHEN T2.REF_PD_CLSF_VAL NOT LIKE '06%' THEN '0'
AND B.PERF_ATC_CD IN ('W02P00085', 'W02P00095')
AND B.PERF_ATC_CD IN ('W03P00085', 'W03P00095')
WHERE A.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND A.BASE_YM = #{perfYm} /*기준년월*/ AND A.CL_DV_CD = #{feeTcntDvCd} /*마감구분코드*/ AND A.OG_TP_CD = #{ogTpCd} /*조직유형코드*/ ) /*2023.08.04 BS실적집계가 되어야 조회 가능하도록 수정*/
AND T1.BASE_PD_CD >= #{strtPdCd} /*상품코드*/
AND T1.BASE_PD_CD <= #{endPdCd} /*상품코드*/

AND T1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD != '4330' /*홈마스터 방문부재건 제외 결함수정건*/

AND PERF_ATC_CD IN ('W03P00085', 'W03P00095', 'W03P00113', 'W03P00114', 'W03P00115' , 'W03P00117' , 'W03P00118' , 'W03P00119', 'W03P00120', 'W03P00121')
AND CO_CD = '2000' /* 회사코드 */ AND OG_TP_CD = #{ogTpCd} /* 조직유형코드 */
